FAILURE_EMAIL_CONTENT:
DAG Failure Notification

Dear Team,

We regret to inform you that the DAG {dag.dag_id} has encountered a failure.

Please review the details and take necessary actions to resolve the issue.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply directly to this email.
SALES_TABLE_SQL:
CREATE TABLE public.raw_sales_data (
                    "Order ID" text,
                    "Product" text,
                    "Quantity Ordered" text,
                    "Price Each" text,
                    "Order Date" text,
                    "Purchase Address" text
                );
LIQUOR_SALES_TABLE_SQL:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS raw_liquor_sales_data
(
    "Invoice/Item Number" text,
    "Date" text,
    "Store Number" integer,
    "Store Name" text,
    "Address" text,
    "City" text,
    "Zip Code" text,
    "Store Location" text,
    "County Number" integer,
    "County" text,
    "Category" integer,
    "Category Name" text,
    "Vendor Number" integer,
    "Vendor Name" text,
    "Item Number" integer,
    "Item Description" text,
    "Pack" integer,
    "Bottle Volume (ml)" integer,
    "State Bottle Cost" double precision,
    "State Bottle Retail" double precision,
    "Bottles Sold" integer,
    "Sale (Dollars)" double precision,
    "Volume Sold (Liters)" double precision,
    "Volume Sold (Gallons)" double precision
)
